actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, S. Rept. 93-1236.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, text of amendment inserted in H.J.Res. 444.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the continued use of certain lands within the Sequoia National Park by portions of an existing hydroelectric project.

summary.text: Authorizes the continued use of specified lands within the Sequoia National Park by portions of an existing hydroelectric project.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the continued use of certain lands within the Sequoia National Park by portions of an existing hydroelectric project.
